item.title: Lightworks
item.author: contact@softorage.com (Sanmay Joshi and Softorage contributors)
item.description: Lightworks is a non-linear editing system (NLE) for editing and mastering digital video. Its features include relatively simple user interface, multiple effects and multiple output formats (Pro version). Forum I Documentation I FAQ
